starter_pack.name: Aether
starter_pack.description: The Aether thrive on order and light.

starter_pack.name: Chaos
starter_pack.description: Fire and brimstone power the Chaos faction and their undead allies.

starter_pack.name: Wyld
starter_pack.description: The strength of earth and nature back the Wyldkin.

unit.name: Pegasus
unit.desc: "Majestic Hooved Beast, Sky Galloper, Long Faced Bird" - Rejected names from the historical text 'Mythical Nomenclature'.

unit.name: Angelic Knight
unit.desc: The fighting prowess of an angel is not questioned by many. At least not for long.

unit.name: Windstorm Elemental
unit.desc: "Woosh woosh woosh woosh" - Ancient Windstorm Elemental saying.

unit.name: Kestrel
unit.desc: Kestrels are the favored form of guard for noble Aether mages.

unit.name: Wind Sprite
unit.desc: Manifestations of the wind itself, these creatures buffet their enemies with strong gusts and laughter.

unit.name: Angelic Brawler
unit.desc: "Fight me in singular combat, bro!"

unit.name: Soul Wisp
unit.desc: "WoooOOOoooOOOooo"

unit.name: Fox Trickster
unit.desc: Foxes often specialize in small magic or illusions, confusing their opponents so they can escape.

unit.name: Lightning Elemental
unit.desc: Lightning strikes where it pleases.

unit.name: Archive Keeper
unit.desc: Those looking for their secrets can find them under archive "P" for pain.

unit.name: Cloud Sylph
unit.desc: "Ooooh! Fluffy!" - Last Words of Bilmior the Adventurer

unit.name: Cherub
unit.desc: Shot through the heart, and you're to blame.

unit.name: Windfrog
unit.desc: "It's impossible to attack them when they keep knocking us off our feet!" - Frustrated Soldier

unit.name: Armored Eagle
unit.desc: "Jarad, is that bird wearing a suit of armor?" - Unsuspecting Castle Guard

unit.name: Oracle
unit.desc: Aether Oracles channel the strength of storms to protect their allies.

unit.name: Glass Colossus
unit.desc: The army thought that because he was made of glass, he would shatter easily... right up until arrows deflected off him.

unit.name: Heroic Frog
unit.desc: "He's not the frog we deserve, but he is the frog we need." - Samael, Leader of Aether

unit.name: Skeleton Warrior
unit.desc: "They may not have brains, but they have... well, not much." - Aria, Necromancer

unit.name: Flame Spirit
unit.desc: "Help! Help! I'm on fire! ...Oh wait."

unit.name: Phase Imp
unit.desc: Bending the lines between realities, the Phase Imp can poison you before you even know it exists.

unit.name: Undead Brute
unit.desc: "They may not have brains, but they have... well, at least this one is big. That's a start." - Aria, Necromancer

unit.name: Goblin Rogue
unit.desc: Quick and nimble, they can cut your purse and your stomach before you know they are there.

unit.name: Smoldering Elemental
unit.desc: "I thought you said I had to CROSS the lava, not FIGHT the lava!" - Bilmior the Adventurer

unit.name: Lava Crab
unit.desc: *snap* *snap*

unit.name: Horned Rakken
unit.desc: "It's not their speed or their weakening poison you need to look out for, it's their knives!" - Desert Nomad

unit.name: Lavafrog
unit.desc: "I once stepped on one, dang near melted my entire boot!" - Valjhor, Traveling Merchant

unit.name: Fire Imp
unit.desc: Fire Imp tongue is considered by many to be the spiciest food ingredient in the known world. Some days even they cannot handle it.

unit.name: Smelted Lava Slug
unit.desc: "Move! Get out of the way! It's going to trample you! ...Eventually." - Wyld Ranger

unit.name: Fallen Angel
unit.desc: "Only those that have truly flown can know what it means to fall."

unit.name: Devouring Locusts
unit.desc: "A thirty foot skeleton or a dragon? I can fight those. This? I cannot even hope to slow this." - Eos, Hero of Llarym

unit.name: Woodland Fairy
unit.desc: Mischievous by nature, they appear before you can even spot them, and are gone just as fast.

unit.name: Moss Golem
unit.desc: "Beware when sitting on a boulder in the Wyldwood, it may not enjoy your choice of seat." -Tellum, Novice Adventurer

unit.name: Dire Wolf
unit.desc: "Have ya ever gotten between a wolf and her pups? No? I wouldn't suggest it." - Wyld Ranger

unit.name: Mermaid Mage
unit.desc: Some myths claim that the origin of all healing magic came first from the seas, carried by the hands of mermaids.

unit.name: Toad Warrior
unit.desc: "They say he doesn't talk much, but I disagree. I've seen him do a lot of talking with that sword." - Frans, Elaria Bartender

unit.name: Flying Squirrel
unit.desc: "Mark my words, that squirrel is smarter than it looks!" - Valjhor, moments after his magical trinkets were stolen.

unit.name: Angler Fish
unit.desc: Their prey is lured in with their hypnotic lantern. The last thing they see is the large mouth before everything goes dark.

unit.name: Turtle Tamer
unit.desc: Slow and steady... crushes its enemies underfoot.

unit.name: Ranger
unit.desc: Protectors of Elaria, they tread the woodland as their second home.

unit.name: Acidic Spider
unit.desc: "Their poison can bring a full grown Tusker to its knees" - Elyse, Ranger

unit.name: Druid
unit.desc: "No one is allowed to touch these bunnies."

unit.name: Rune Panther
unit.desc: When angered, they pull the energy of the earth around them to glow with awesome power.

unit.name: Frog Scout
unit.desc: "Their scouts are invaluable, but we need to stop letting them name the new settlements. I can't take another Flytopia." - Expedition Researcher

unit.name: Earth Elemental
unit.desc: "Sticks and stones can break my bones... No, that's the end of the rhyme." - Frans, Elaria Bartender

unit.name: Rock Titan
unit.desc: Who watches the horse watcher?

unit.name: Mysterious Egg
unit.desc: A mysterious egg we picked up during our travels. No one knows where it came from, but it begins to move when near Embersouls.

unit.name: Narix, Dragon Whelp
unit.desc: The egg has hatched into a newborn dragon! He's got an appetite for Embersouls.

unit.name: Narix, the Defiant
unit.desc: Narix has grown in size, and he's becoming harder to control. He still follows your orders, but he's getting more intelligent every day.

unit.name: Eos
unit.desc: The creature appeared after the battle of Llarym. The soldiers named it to honor the great hero Eos, whom had lead them to victory.

unit.name: Chillbeard Giant
unit.desc: "Did that dragon just ask you to please chill out?" - Concerned Adventurer

unit.name: Rocket Rider
unit.desc: "This seemed like such a good idea before I got on the rocket..."

unit.name: Reks, the Forlorn
unit.desc: Reks fell in combat against Fiona and her dragons of Tarragon Peak.

unit.name: Deadeye Apprentice
unit.desc: "A drop of moose blood and the eye of a pigeon makes the perfect creation..."

unit.name: Hob Fletcher
unit.desc: "We were impressed with the way some goblins used tools to keep themselves safely from danger. Hopefully they can refrain from adding fire to archery as well." - Burned Researcher Notes

unit.name: Arcane Snowman
unit.desc: He shows snow mercy.

unit.name: Arcane Snowmonster
unit.desc: He gives snow ground.

unit.name: Arcane Snowmenace
unit.desc: "He knows a lot about snow." - Jon Nothing

unit.name: Hunter Zind
unit.desc: Renowned for his skill in tracking, Zind's keen senses keep him one step ahead of his prey.

unit.name: Arms Enforcer
unit.desc: Champion of the people, master of all armaments.

unit.name: Arcane Scroll
unit.desc: "Brushing your finger along the wrong rune can unleash its stored magic to disastrous effects." - Last Lesson of Magi Neyaroi

unit.name: Concealed Dragon
unit.desc: "Concealed dragons create their own clouds in which to hide." - Researcher Notes

unit.name: Lurking Dragon
unit.desc: "If they can't see our sentries they can't defend against them!" - Yuriel, Owl Mystic

unit.name: Veiled Dragon
unit.desc: "Wait. Where did they go?" - Yuriel, Owl Mystic

unit.name: Winged Raptor
unit.desc: Application for Avian classification denied. Maybe in a few million years.

unit.name: Joryl
unit.desc: The boy Amiri always had an affinity for magic involving stone, even at a very young age.

unit.name: Joryl of Marble
unit.desc: The marble that Amiri used to awaken Joryl was the very bedrock of his home.

unit.name: Joryl of Onyx Marble
unit.desc: Joryl followed Amiri, defending their land from invaders and becoming a living legend.

unit.name: Anura Witch
unit.desc: "Owl's wing, bat's fur, a touch of baboon blood and... TOAD?!"

unit.name: Bemola
unit.desc: "Winter is coming."

unit.name: Hive Guard
unit.desc: The members of a colony charged with its defense have often evolved precisely for that task.

unit.name: Godfried the Hunter
unit.desc: "And in the face of the beast Godfried sang the song of his death, proudly and with a smile on his face." - The Tales of Luminis

unit.name: Everspark Ace
unit.desc: When Everspark enters the battlefield it tends to shock the opposition.

unit.name: Brahzee
unit.desc: "... an' that cloud looks like a... long legged... sheep... thing... Hey, is it looking at us?" - Klepplo Goblin Trader

unit.name: Honor Risen
unit.desc: In death their soul is consumed by the blade, walking the land as a spirit.

unit.name: Honor Fulfiller
unit.desc: The blade seeks more souls, carrying the corpse of its last victim in its quest.

unit.name: Dotora Spirit
unit.desc: Spirits of long lost warriors of the Dotora civilization, they roam the Salt Wastes without purpose.

unit.name: Apollyon
unit.desc: Apollyon's sacrifice saved hundreds, but the full cost of his death was never understood until his return.

unit.name: Gomblit
unit.desc: Drawing Death in Goblin Tarot is quite literal.

unit.name: Scaly Newborn
unit.desc: "...and the whistling sound they make when they first hatch is SO ADORABLE!" - Elaria Researcher

unit.name: Breezy Newborn
unit.desc: "Even at a young age the force which they can expell wind can knock a grown man in armor from his feet." - Elaria Researcher

unit.name: Enclave Dragon
unit.desc: "Jonan thought he had outsmarted the army by using the caverns. Little did he know they had anticipated such a move." - The Tales of Luminis

upgrade.desc: "Everyone looks like ants from up here... now I'm hungry."

unit.name: Goblin Crew
unit.desc: "What they lack in intelligence, they make up for in numbers." - Decim, the Firebringer

unit.name: Celerity
unit.desc: "It means to be very fast, look it up!" - Defensive Researcher

unit.name: Wortwog
unit.desc: "Why are ya' cryin'? It'll grow back."

unit.name: Treeblade Thief
unit.desc: "In the shade or in the glade, there is always a blade." - Treeblade Saying

unit.name: Shadowcrafter
unit.desc: "Never trust a magpie." - Kor'ladesh, Minos Poisonmancer

unit.name: Phoenix
unit.desc: Born once in a thousand years, the Phoenix can never truely die.

unit.name: Firetail Dragon
unit.desc: "Often found roaming the great plains of Nuramatha, it is hypothesized that they are the reason for the lack of forests in the area." - Researcher's Notes

unit.name: Bone Wielder
unit.desc: "The boomerangs work great, the problem is that the goblins can never stay still long enough for it to return." - Discarded Researcher Notes

unit.name: Enigma
unit.desc: Enigma have been known to challenge adventurers with complex puzzles with the prize being their very life.

unit.name: Rugarth, Fallen Bones
unit.desc: "The day Rugarth was struck down, the army celebrated its victory, unaware of the monster they would soon face." - History of Aracantica XII

unit.name: Released Captives
unit.desc: "We thought death would be the end."

unit.name: Doxum's Construct
unit.desc: "Who's the 'little one' now Jubjub?! HAHAHAHAhahahaha!" - Doxum

unit.name: Gob Launcher
unit.desc: "One... two... FIVE!"

unit.name: Sheltering Wing
unit.desc: "Gaining the trust of a dragon is better than forging any weapon."

unit.name: Tiamat
unit.desc: "Born of Chaos and Aether, Tiamat was overwhelmed by its Chaotic nature and eventually turned on those it was to protect." - Ballad of Vularias IX

unit.name: Ribbitaksu
unit.desc: "Mushi no ken wo kurae!"

unit.name: Wasteland Crusher
unit.desc: "You don't want to bug the frogs in the wastes. Trust me. They take their rocks very seriously." - Ol' Cedric

unit.name: Treant Sapling
unit.desc: One touch can pull the life force right out of you.

unit.name: Water Serpent
unit.desc: "He looks so happy!" "Of course he does. He just found lunch!" - Boloros Sailors

unit.name: Webclaw Dragon
unit.desc: "The Webclaw Dragons have stolen more coin and changed more merchant routes than I could dream of doing." - Kilmor, Pirate Captain

unit.name: Stinglash Rider
unit.desc: "Whhyyyy!?!" - The Scorpion

unit.name: Bee Eater
unit.desc: Originally classified by its distinctive swollen tongue, it was soon discovered the the swollen tongue was actually a result of its diet.

unit.name: Trailblazer
unit.desc: Its only natural predator is the wily witted coyote.

unit.name: Shenami
unit.desc: "What is your wish?"

unit.name: Shenami the Divine
unit.desc: "That is beyond my power."

unit.name: Shenami the Eternal
unit.desc: "Your wish is granted."

unit.name: Heralded Slugger
unit.desc: "There are rumors of an angel who abandoned his oaths after a disaster crashed his ship in the depths of a forest." - Overheard in a Tavern

unit.name: Forest Umbras
unit.desc: They sprout from the roots of trees after heavy rains.

unit.name: Wood Umbras
unit.desc: Adventurers speak of the umbra, but only a lucky few see them for brief moments.

unit.name: Thicket Umbras
unit.desc: The umbra are rarely spotted, but their healing effects can be seen in the forest itself.

unit.name: Sludge Spine
unit.desc: "I'll never look at me fish bones th' same again." - Angar, Ship's Captain

unit.name: Jubjub
unit.desc: "Jubjub was strongest big leader in forest. No one bigger than Jubjub." - Jubjub

unit.name: Talonsaur
unit.desc: "When parched throat turns sore and you seek shore, beware of Talonsaur." - Novice Adventurer's Advice Volume VII

unit.name: Wavomancer
unit.desc: "All the flexibility of the river, and all the rage of the sea." - Mermaid Mage

unit.name: Floodomancer
unit.desc: "Those who do not adapt, fall. Those who do not evolve, fail."

unit.name: Doomsday
unit.desc: Hey. Hey you.

unit.name: No Really, Doomsday
unit.desc: Hey over here.

unit.name: I Mean It, Doomsday!
unit.desc: HEY!!!

unit.name: Stormcloud Pegasus
unit.desc: "Some say they grow to harness the energy of the sky. And some say they just eat a storm cloud and turn dark." - Magi Neyaroi

unit.name: Astral Pegasus
unit.desc: "Why are we losing to a horse with wings!? And why is it GLOWING?!?" - Bilmior the Adventurer

unit.name: Sky Knight
unit.desc: "Are you from heaven? Because the fall might kill you."

unit.name: Luminous Knight
unit.desc: The extra lighting helps to prevent mid air collisions with other angels in the dark of night.

unit.name: Purified Kestrel
unit.desc: "The gathering energy of the Aether can purify even the most violent of creatures." - Yuriel, Owl Mystic

unit.name: Spirit Kestrel
unit.desc: Having gathered the natural energy of Aether lands, the Kestrel transcends its physical form.

unit.name: Wind Spirit
unit.desc: "...and there she was, in the center of the forest alone, sweet as the wind and sharp as a blade." - Ballad of Vularias IX

unit.name: Wind Soul
unit.desc: "Without warning nor word, the soul of the wind fell upon us like a hammer to the forge." - Ballad of Vularias IX

unit.name: Irate Soul Wisp
unit.desc: "No really, we're ghosts!"

unit.name: Enraged Soul Wisp
unit.desc: "And you thought my COUSIN was mean?"

unit.name: Fox Charmer
unit.desc: Soothing the mind and the body.

unit.name: Thunder Elemental
unit.desc: Every ship on the sea is a perfectly fine lightning rod.

unit.name: Bolt Elemental
unit.desc: The path of least resistance is you.

unit.name: Veteran Cherub
unit.desc: Many battles won, many hearts conquered.

unit.name: Wartorn Cherub
unit.desc: War... war never changes.

unit.name: Oda the Guardian
unit.desc: Oda was born in a far away land, shipwrecked, and raised on a remote island temple. He's ventured in search of spellstones as a pilgrimage for his order and honor.

unit.name: Yuriel the Owl Mystic
unit.desc: The Grand Library of the Aether has been curated by the Owl Mystics for hundreds of years. Their knowledge is accumulated in Yuriel through their ancestral bloodline.

unit.name: Samael
unit.desc: Samael is the powerful and stoic leader of the Aether faction of magic. Don't ask him about the difference between bird wings and angel wings.

unit.name: Aria the Necromancer
unit.desc: Aria is a powerful necromancer who aligns herself with Chaos magic. She likes long walks by moonlight and 'making' new friends.

unit.name: Decim the Firebringer
unit.desc: Decim has always had an affinity for fire magic, even before being exiled from his village after it mysteriously burned down. An accident with a stolen spellstone imbued him with powerful abilities while also taking most of his sanity.

unit.name: Tarian the Lich Lord
unit.desc: Wrapped in the cold winds of death, Tarian sits upon his throne as the center of the Chaos. Well respected, and well feared. He's a skeleton afterall.

unit.name: Elyse the Ranger
unit.desc: Elyse lived a simple life on the edge of civilization until adulthood, giving her a burning spirit for adventure and the tools to track it.

unit.name: Commander Ursurio
unit.desc: Ursurio is a respected representative of the Wyld despite his often aloof attitude and outlook. And hunger cravings.

unit.name: Groc the Hammer
unit.desc: An ancient being of living stone, Groc wanders the wilderness in search of wisdom. You don't want to be between him and a hard place.

unit.name: Rayne the Wavecrasher
unit.desc: A master of water and wind magic, Rayne is the prime guardian of water life on Arcantica. She really knows how to rain on a parade.

unit.name: Orgoth the Hex Fist
unit.desc: A respected leader of the Salt Waste tribes, Orgoth gained strange magical powers once buried deep in the Wastes. If he tries to give you a handshake you should probably decline.

unit.name: Ol' Cedric
unit.desc: Cedric is the former First Sword of the Emperor, High Commander of Dawnglow. Since retirement he spends much of his time training younger generations, advising the emperor, and catching flies for recreation.

unit.name: Oda the Aegis
unit.desc: Oda has taken his place as the Keeper of Seastone Temple's artifact, transcending his abilities. Unfortunately the upgrades don't come with a new outfit.

unit.name: Yuriel the Manashifter
unit.desc: The true potential of the ancestral bloodline of Owl Mystics has been realized in Yuriel. After years of study, he has stumbled upon the secrets of Manashifting. He's also collected a lot of late fines.

unit.name: Aria the Nightwielder
unit.desc: Aria's close call with The Void pushed her to the brink of her abilities. She learned new powers, and intends to use them to make new friends.

unit.name: Decim the Pyrokinetic
unit.desc: Decim's training and close contact with dragons has taught him new heights to his abilities. Which shouldn't be a surprise as he's always enjoyed finding new ways to burn things.

unit.name: Elyse the Truestriker
unit.desc: Elyse has embraced the magic of the Wyld, becoming one with the world around her. She even sometimes leaves her books at home.

unit.name: General Ursurio
unit.desc: After countless years of dedicated laziness and a sloth-like attitude, Ursurio has gotten the promotion he barely wanted. If only it came with free sides.

unit.name: Undead Horde
unit.desc: A horde of risen creatures and skeletons, mindlessly attacking anything within reach.

unit.name: Wyld Wolf
unit.desc: The Wyldwood does not take kindly to strangers, and its creatures vigorously defend its borders.

unit.name: Elaria Captain
unit.desc: The Elaria Captain is the first line of defense for the researchers of the Elaria encampment. Part of his responsibilities is taking new arrivals and training them.

unit.name: Luminis Angel
unit.desc: A native of Luminis and a natural defender of the realm.

unit.name: Will O' Wisp
unit.desc: Manifestations of the raw energy of the world around them.

unit.name: Mermaid Augurer
unit.desc: The rivers of Luminis run deeper than they appear, housing many of the sea's dangers.

unit.name: Grim Titan
unit.desc: A flood of demons and monsters, centered around a large titan at their head.

unit.name: Void Assassin
unit.desc: "They came right through the walls." - Marr, Blacksmith

unit.name: Void Minions
unit.desc: Primal forces of the void, manifested as the nightmares of the living.

unit.name: Orobas of the Void
unit.desc: "The Orobas is possibly the most frightening creature in all of Karthos. Or at least the biggest." - Magi Neyaroi

unit.name: Lava Crab Gang
unit.desc: Don't make them crabby.

unit.name: Wraith Den
unit.desc: In the untamed wasteland of Karthos, wraiths tend to congregate and create dangerous dens that lure other powerful beasts.

unit.name: Caverns of Crossing
unit.desc: The dangerous and only path to The Void.

unit.name: Grand Hermit Malchior
unit.desc: The father of spellstone research, he is the greatest mind in his field. Even with some of it missing.

unit.name: Tremor Wurm
unit.desc: The wurm breaks out of the ground suddenly, spraying rock in all directions as it bellows a sound like a thousand trumpets.

unit.name: Void Abomination
unit.desc: The ground shatters to reveal a huge anomoly made of shadows and smoke. Eyes peer out at the adventurers below as its massive form swings and crushes stone.

unit.name: Trainee Elyse
unit.desc: Elyse is a new adventurer like yourself. She's training with the Captain, though she seems more than eager to be out on her own.

unit.name: Trainee Oda
unit.desc: Oda is a new adventurer like yourself. He trains alongside you, but seems very reserved and quiet.

unit.name: Tainted Wolf
unit.desc: A long wolf lurks throughout the woods. Its movements unnatural, the look in its eyes dangerous.

unit.name: Maniac General
unit.desc: A former leader of a Chaos faction, his mind has been tainted by some foul magic that causes him to act dangerously against the other factions and his own.

unit.name: Voidlings
unit.desc: Incarnations of the Void itself, manifested into small servents of mayhem.

unit.name: Alpha Wisp
unit.desc: And you thought my COUSIN was mean?

unit.name: Titan Twins
unit.desc: A pair of unusually large fire titan twins, Jar and Mar.

unit.name: Escaped Angel
unit.desc: An Aether creature freed when the undead ravaged the researchers' camp in Elaria.

unit.name: Consumed Undead
unit.desc: These undead move with purpose and in unity. They are not like the shambling undead that wander the camp.

unit.name: Skeletal Army
unit.desc: An army of undead warriors, their glowing eyes shine in the night and their blades drag on the ground.

unit.name: Wasteland Wolf Pack
unit.desc: In the wastes, no one can hear you howl.

unit.name: Lost Lava Crab
unit.desc: You idley wonder how this little crab got here, right before it snips your finger.

unit.name: Wasteland Wraiths
unit.desc: The shadows of night cloak that which lurks in the wastes.

unit.name: Voidlings
unit.desc: Creatures of pure corruption. They rise from the ground like shadows given life.

unit.name: Skeleton Familiar
unit.desc: Aria's favorite skeleton companion and possibly only friend. His name is Little Tarian.

unit.name: Aria, Void Consumed
unit.desc: Aria has fallen to the corruption of the Void.

unit.name: Frenzied Dragon
unit.desc: The dragons of Tarragon Peak have gone into a frenzy after a series of earthquakes around the mountain.

unit.name: Orobas, Raging Beast
unit.desc: An ancient beast that lives deep in the earth. Rarely seen above ground. Considered extremely dangerous by most adventurers.

unit.name: Thing In The Lake
unit.desc: Well, at least if this is the end I don't need to file my taxes.

unit.name: The Maddest Bomber
unit.desc: Bombs are actually a very delicate art. At least, as delicate as massive explosions can be.

unit.name: Chicken Enthusiast
unit.desc: "BAWK BAWK BAWK"

unit.name: Cavern Wisp
unit.desc: In the darkest depths the light can shine brightest.

unit.name: Risen Warrior
unit.desc: A rattling can be heard in the darkness, bones and metal scrapping across the stone.

unit.name: Underhill Caverns
unit.desc: The darkest corners of the Underhill dungeons hide unfathomable dangers.

unit.name: Ascetic Scientists
unit.desc: Withdrawing from society, these undead continue their scientific work even after their bodies have given up.

unit.name: Hornslice Fiend
unit.desc: "The last thing the adventurers heard was the wooshing crack of its fire whip from the darkness." - Collection of Bardic Tales IV

unit.name: Dark Dweller
unit.desc: "No one understands what lurks in the furthest depths of the earth. Things beyond imagination." - Arcanists Scrolls of Prophecy

unit.name: Ruler of the Depths
unit.desc: "In the farthest shadows of the Underhill lurks a beast over 2000 years old. It preys on death itself and fears nothing." - J.L. Montrello

unit.name: Marrowsworn the Tyrant
unit.desc: "Marrowsworn was bound to the depths of the Underhill, forever kept from tormenting the living." - Tarian the Lich Lord

unit.name: Whirling Devil
unit.desc: A former servant of Solaron, the whirling devil was banished into the dungeon's depths.

unit.name: Magma Clipper
unit.desc: When a Magma Clipper dies, its form dissolves into a puddle of lava.

unit.name: Coral Stinger
unit.desc: When exposed to the magical properties of a spellstone, some stalactites transform into beasts.

unit.name: Null Darkness
unit.desc: Those who stare into the eyes of darkness feel their strength and spirit slowly ebb away.

unit.name: Deep Titan
unit.desc: "A creature of the dungeon's darkness, it turns into stone when exposed to light." - Collection of Bardic Tales III

unit.name: Earthen Guardian
unit.desc: A manufactured construct that turned upon its own creator, the Earthen Guardian wanders the dungeon without purpose.

unit.name: World Light
unit.desc: Once revered as a deity, the World Light is nothing more than a powerful elemental that seeks the souls of adventurers.

unit.name: Gorvo, Mountain King
unit.desc: Once, Gorvo ruled a kingdom of earth elementals beneath the earth's surface, but was lost in the sands of time.

unit.name: Arcane Dustling
unit.desc: A manifestation of pure arcane powers. The Dustling only appears when a gap of power occurs in the shifting realities.

unit.name: Arcane Ore
unit.desc: The combination of Arcane Fragments. It has little combat use, but is a great source of resources.

unit.name: Arcane Pumpkin
unit.desc: A special fruit that blooms only in fall throughout Arcantica. Not very flavorful, but a great source of Arcane Dust.

unit.name: Large Arcane Pumpkin
unit.desc: A special fruit that blooms only in fall throughout Arcantica. Not very flavorful, but a great source of Arcane Dust.

unit.name: Arcane Chunk
unit.desc: A small chunk of Spellstone material, broken from a larger Spellstone. It has little combat use, but can be Vaporized for resources.

unit.name: Arcane Ore
unit.desc: A deposit of Spellstone ore with no creature inside. It has little combat use, but can be Vaporized for resources.

unit.name: Arcane Deposit
unit.desc: A massive deposit of Spellstone ore. It has little combat use, but can be Vaporized for resources.

unit.name: Castle Tower
unit.desc: These structures are built by adventurers to protect their camps as they travel Arcantica.

unit.name: Cannon Tower
unit.desc: "You know what's better than a tower? A tower with a CANNON!" - Jarad, Castle Guard

unit.name: Tree of Life
unit.desc: "I don't know what's in that tree, but I do sure feel better!" - Jarad, Castle Guard

unit.name: Fortified Tower
unit.desc: "I've never seen'a more fortified tower in the middle of a grass field." - Jarad, Castle Guard

unit.name: Fortified Horror
unit.desc: "THE TOWER IS MOUNTING A COUNTER OFFENSE!" - Jarad, Castle Guard

skillType.name: Imbue
skillType.desc: Grants a random allied creature a skill until the start of your next turn
skillType.desc_all: Grants all allied creatures a skill until the start of your next turn
skillType.desc_faction: Grants a random allied {y} creature a skill until the start of your next turn
skillType.desc_all_faction: Grants all allied {y} creatures a skill until the start of your next turn

skillType.name: Enhance
skillType.desc: Increase effect of skill on a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Increase effect of skill on all allied creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Increase effect of skill on a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Increase effect of skill on all allied {y} creatures

skillType.name: Invisibility
skillType.desc: Avoids enemy skills

skillType.name: Taunt
skillType.desc: Attack damage dealt to adjacent creatures is dealt to this creature instead.

skillType.name: Armor
skillType.desc: Prevents damage taken by attacks

skillType.name: Vengeance
skillType.desc: When damaged by an attack, deal damage to attacker

skillType.name: Corrosive
skillType.desc: Creatures attacking this gain Corrosion, lowering Attack. This effect stacks. Wears off if not reapplied for a turn.

skillType.name: Valor
skillType.desc: First time this activates, gains Attack permanently if opposing card has more Attack.

skillType.name: Empower
skillType.desc: Boosts Attack of a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Boosts Attack of all allied creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Boosts Attack of a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Boosts Attack of all allied {y} creatures

skillType.name: Heal
skillType.desc: Heals a random allied creature

skillType.name: Barrier
skillType.desc: Reduces the next Damage dealt to a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the next Damage dealt to all allied creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the next Damage dealt to a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the next Damage dealt to all allied {y} creatures

skillType.name: Legion
skillType.desc: Empowers allied creatures adjacent to this creature.
skillType.desc_faction: Empowers allied {y} creatures adjacent to this creature.

skillType.name: Fervor
skillType.desc: Empowers this creature for each adjacent allied creature.
skillType.desc_faction: Empowers this creature for each adjacent allied {y} creature.

skillType.name: Hex
skillType.desc: Increase Damage dealt to a random enemy creature
skillType.desc_all: Increase Damage dealt to all enemy creatures

skillType.name: Bolt
skillType.desc: Deals damage to a random enemy creature
skillType.desc_all: Deals damage to all enemy creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Deals damage to a random enemy {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Deals damage to all enemy {y} creatures

skillType.name: Frostbreath
skillType.desc: Deals damage in a cone to up to three creatures in front of it.

skillType.name: Scorch
skillType.desc: Deals stacking damage to the enemy across from this creature at end of turn. Wears off if not reapplied for a turn.

skillType.name: Freeze
skillType.desc: Random enemy creature doesn't attack or activate abilities on its next turn. Activates every {c} turns.

skillType.name: Weaken
skillType.desc: Reduces Attack of a random enemy creature
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the Attack of all enemy creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the Attack of a random enemy {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the attack of all enemy {y} creatures

skillType.name: Pierce
skillType.desc: Reduces the effect of enemy Armor and Barriers

skillType.name: Silence
skillType.desc: Removes all skills from damaged enemy creature for one turn.

skillType.name: Nullify
skillType.desc: Nullifies enemy creatures damaged by this card. Nullified units avoid their own friendly skills.

skillType.name: Poison
skillType.desc: Poisons enemies damaged by this card, dealing additional damage at the end of turn

skillType.name: Siphon
skillType.desc: Heals this card as it deals Attack damage

skillType.name: Berserk
skillType.desc: When this creature deals attack damage, Attack is permanently increased

skillType.name: Dualstrike
skillType.desc: Activates twice in one turn. Activates every {c} turns.

skillType.name: Iceshatter Barrier
skillType.desc: Reduces the next Damage dealt to a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the next Damage dealt to all allied creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the next Damage dealt to a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the next Damage dealt to all allied {y} creatures

skillType.name: Reanimate
skillType.desc: Reanimates creatures when they die.

skillType.name: Resurrect
skillType.desc: Resurrects creatures when they die.

skillType.name: Poisonbolt
skillType.desc: Deals damage to a random enemy creature...and poison
skillType.desc_all: Deals damage to all enemy creatures...and poison
skillType.desc_faction: Deals damage to a random enemy {y} creature...and poison
skillType.desc_all_faction: Deals damage to all enemy {y} creatures...and poison

skillType.name: Weaken
skillType.desc: Reduces Attack of a random allied creature
skillType.desc_all: Reduces the Attack of all ally creatures
skillType.desc_faction: Reduces the Attack of a random allied {y} creature
skillType.desc_all_faction: Reduces the attack of all ally {y} creatures

skillType.name: Vengence Scorch
skillType.desc: Deals stacking damage to the enemy across from this creature at end of turn. Wears off if not reapplied for a turn.

skillType.name: barrage
skillType.desc: Deal damage to random enemy creatures

skillType.name: Maelstrom's Fury
skillType.desc: When damaged by an attack, deal damage to attacker and increase Attack permanently

skillType.name: Slow
skillType.desc: Increases the creature's delay.
